amendment.description: To require the Postal Service to consider the effect of closing or consolidating a postal facility on the ability of the affected community to vote by mail and to provide for a moratorium on the closing or consolidation of post offices and postal facilities to protect the ability to vote by mail.

action.text: Amendment SA 2020 proposed by Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2020 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
